label: Land Surveying
description: Services related to land surveying, including boundary disputes, property valuation, and party wall agreements.
intents: Find a land surveyor near me

subcategories.label: Boundary Disputes
subcategories.description: Services related to resolving boundary disputes between neighboring properties.

subcategories.label: Property Valuation
subcategories.description: Services related to determining the value of a property.

subcategories.label: Party Wall Agreements
subcategories.description: Services related to negotiating and resolving disputes related to party walls.

subcategories.label: Land Surveyor Services
subcategories.description: Services related to land surveying, including topographical surveys and site engineering surveys.

subcategories.label: Building Surveying
subcategories.description: Services related to building surveying, including structural surveys and building control surveys.
